fields.name: Grow Big
fields.detail: NPK ratio: 6-4-4. Suitable for vegetative growth.

fields.name: Tiger Bloom
fields.detail: NPK ratio: 2-8-4. Suitable for flowering stage.

fields.name: Big Bloom
fields.detail: NPK ratio: 0.01-0.3-0.7. Suitable for all growth stages.

fields.name: Bud Candy
fields.detail: Contains carbohydrates and amino acids to enhance flavor and aroma of buds.

fields.name: Rhino Skin
fields.detail: Contains potassium silicate to strengthen cell walls and improve resistance to stress.
